label: 花の御所
本: From Sovereign to Symbol: An Age of Ritual Determinism in Fourteenth Century Japan . Oxford University Press . 2012
見出し読み: はな の ごしょ
説明文: Ashikaga Yoshimitsu's palace, which surpassed the imperial palace in size and quality, and occupied a more northen area of the capital, which was a sign of superior authority.
